headline: TDK LAMBDA GENESYS DC POWER SUPPLY 600 VOLT 2.6 AMP 1500 WATT

specstable:
Manufacturer TDK-Lambda
Model GEN 600-2.6IS510
Maximum Output Voltage 600.00 Volts
Maximum Output Current 2.60 Amps
Maximum Output Power 1.50 kW
Regulation Modes Constant Current Constant Voltage
Panel Meters Digital
Interface RS 232
Interface 2 RS 485
Bipolar No
Control Type Programmable
External Cooling Air Cooled
Other Information

P/N: 00507263

Has ISOLATED ANALOG PROGRAMMING OPTION IS510, can be removed, REQUEST removal when ordering if you need to use all J1 pins!

When the Isolated Analog Option is installed, do not apply any signals to the
non-isolated VPGM and IPGM (J1-9 and J1-10) pins. All other J1 features
may be used normally. Refer to Section 4.5 for a description of J1 features.

follow this link https://product.tdk.com/info/en/products/power/tec_data/ps_system_genesys.html for the manual

Extended Description Details at TDK Lambda Genesys 1.5kW Specifications.pdf
